My Experience

University of Kent

BSc Computer Science with a Year in Industry (2015-2019)

Studied Java, JavaScript, PHP, C, C++, Maths, Cryptography, Computing Theory etc. Undertook a final year group project in PHP (Laravel) and C# for a real client based in Kent.

CGI Group

Technical Consultant (2017-2018)

Worked in the Space, Defence and Intelligence sector within CGI for my industrial placement year, on CGI's Skynet5 Project. I used Java, SQL, VB, Crystal Reports and carried out infrastructure type work involving SSH, SCP, FTP and more.

MRI Software

Software Engineer (2019-Present)

Working with a stack of C# (MVC Framework), JavaScript and Oracle SQL on MRI's Horizon.
